Experience Mobile Apps Lead (EMEA) - Strategic Partners Google December 2013  – Present (1 year 9 months) - Define and execute end-to-end internal mobile mid-market strategy to drive product adoption and growth (AdX, DFP, Adsense, Admob): team structure, sales compensation plan & OKRs, market segmentation.

Summary A fully-qualified software engineer who became an accidental intrapeneur for some of the world's largest tech companies. 
 
With over 9 years of experience working in Facebook & Google, along with over 3 years in Start-ups & Agencies, I have a strong track record of setting up business functions from the ground up (account management, operations, analytics, policy and more). I love to be involved at all stages. I build teams, train them and lead them to do amazing things. I am intelligent, self-reliant, independent, thoughtful and analytical, with a keen sense of humour that I bring into everything I do. I am a strong communicator at all levels, with a passion for public speaking. I am driven by honesty & integrity, and have a passion to learn. I am most interested in companies & roles that have variety and ambiguity. I want to feel passionate about, and make a difference in, what I do. 
 
I've built EMEA account management functions for Google and Facebook from the ground up - designing services and processes, hiring and training teams, and driving them to generate hundreds of millions of dollars in revenue. I have a track record of establishing new business operations, including building an award-winning half-billion dollar SMB business; designing and building performance and data analytics functions and teams that have generated millions of dollars in revenue; and saving tens of millions in costs through process improvement and automation. 
 
I've designed award-winning training programs for, and trained, hundreds of people, and presented at conferences to hundreds more.  
 
I've authored published articles and provided digital strategy mentoring for organisations. 
 
Specialties: Online; intrapeneurship; problem-solving; strategic thinking & planning; data analysis; sales operations; sales/biz dev/account management; customer service; public speaking; training; leadership. Summary Expertise in online marketing, with client side experience as the Head of Digital Acquisition at Oxfam, network side as a Strategic Partner Manager at Google, agency side as an International Account Manager at Group M (WPP) and technology side as Client Services Manager at Marin Software. 
 
Highlights include: 
 
• Transitioning Online Marketing in-house from an agency. Bringing all our online marketing on to the Doubleclick stack to be in a position to maximise future opportunities across programmatic. 
• Raising over £1 million in donations in multiple charity appeals from PPC, Display, Affiliates, Native and Paid Social, far higher than in emergency appeals run under the agency model.  
• Managing a portfolio (>$1.5 million monthly revenues) of Tier1 Publishers while at Google, with excellent ratings and target achievements. 
• Managing an ad spend of over £2.5 million across Display, PPC, SEO & Affiliates across 3 agencies, including creative as well as media buying, while working as the Online Marketing Manager for Oxfam.  
 
Further to my extensive online marketing experience, I have an MSc in Political Research applied in full research project management for high profile clients including: The Office for Criminal Justice Reform, The Department for Transport and The Greater London Authority. 
 
Specialties: Ad Serving, PPC, SEO, Affiliates, Google Analytics, Google Adwords, Google Adsense, Omniture Site Catalyst, Marin Software, Doubleclick Digital Marketing Suite, Political Research, Data Analysis, Analytics, Excel, Spanish. Summary High energy professional with a creative mind and high work capacity.  
 
Having worked in international companies in the dynamic IT/Tech industry since 2005, I have been able to grow my network and am well connected in the local as well as global Internet/IT industry.  
 
I work with Google´s premium publishing partners, conveying a broader partnership opportunity, helping them to imagine how Google can deliver value across business needs. Our product portfolio consist in e.g. Google AdSense, DoubleClick for Publishers and AdExchange (incl. Admeld). Helping our partners making the most of the web is a mission I share with the global Google team servicing partners across our global network. 
 
Additionally to my career at Google I run an e-commerce business together with my husband and 2 partners, called Active Outfit (www.activeoutfit.se). The store entails gear for hunting and outdoor, and targets consumers who prefers high-quality equipment for their hunting and -outdoor experiences.  
 
My work experiences have taught me to recognize and synthesize competition and trends, and applying this understanding into Partner Management, Strategic Business Development and Marketing -and Product Management is what identifies me as a business professional. 
 
I have also been working part-time as Marketing Consultant for 10 years, helping businesses improve their Communication and Marketing efforts. (Reference clients: ActiveOutfit.se, P&L Nordic AB, Ksweden AB, Lagarbetarskap.se)

He manages trusted relationships with gaming publishers/developers to help them grow their online business with the help of Google's suite of products. Outside of work, Derk loves to travel and is a passionate triathlete specializing in the Ironman distance.
